about_the_game:
Redline is an arcade style, zero gravity racer focused on extreme speed and precision with easy to pick up but hard to master gameplay. Race solo against A.I or against friends in up to four player splitscreen! Drive into your opponents redline to steal their speed and decimate the competition! 

Use the redline 

Race in your opponent’s redline to absorb it’s energy and gain limit breaking boosts. 

Use evasive driving to keep your opponent’s out of your redline. 

High speed, high precision racing 

Race at speeds in excess of 1000 kph, using precision two joystick steering. 

Zero gravity racing through a dense and vast metropolis 

Race upside down, through corkscrews, and up the side of vast skyscrapers on a track that takes you from the dense undercity to the clouds and back. 

Race with a variety of ships and speed classes, on your own, or with friends 

Pick your speed class, pick your ship, and race in up to 4 player split screen, or on your own in 8 player races.

Redline is an arcade style, zero gravity racer focused on extreme speed and precision with easy to pick up but hard to master gameplay. Race solo against A.I or against friends in up to four player splitscreen! Drive into your opponents redline to steal their speed and decimate the competition!

Zero gravity racing through a dense and vast metropolis 

Race upside down, through corkscrews, and up the side of vast skyscrapers on a track that takes you from the dense undercity to the clouds and back.

name: Redline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: High octane zero gravity racing! Race around a gravity defying track at over 1000 kph using precision two joystick steering. Race in your opponent's redline to build limit-breaking boosts. Race on your own, or with friends in up to 4 player splitscreen.
